articles.title: 3 decades after teen's murder, DNA helps ID killer with a history of crimes against women - CBS News
articles.description: "One thing the detectives kept telling us was … eventually technology's gonna solve this case. … I trusted that, and they turned out that they were right," Sarah Yarborough's mother tells "48 Hours."
